rows.label: tlk45100121_01_msg0001
rows.name:
My mam's always so strict, and she's
obsessed with winning! She doesn't
believe losing is ever an option!

rows.label: tlk45100121_01_msg0002
rows.name:
That's why she taught me some
tricks to win in a fight, in case I
ever get into one.

rows.label: tlk45100121_01_msg0003
rows.name: First of all, Break the enemy's stance!

rows.label: tlk45100121_01_msg0004
rows.name: Then knock them over to Topple them!

rows.label: tlk45100121_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Once you do that, none of your
attacks will miss, so you can beat
the heck out of them!

rows.label: tlk45100121_01_msg0006
rows.name:
'Course, I've never actually got into
a fight with Leif, so I haven't tested
it out for myself...
